Class
RestfulX::AMF::ClassMapping::MappingSet
In: lib/restfulx/amf/class_mapping.rb
Parent: Object
Methods
  • map
Attributes
[RW] default_as_prefix
Public Instance methods
map(params)

Map a given AS class to a ruby class.

Use fully qualified names for both.

Example: 

  m.map :as 'com.example.Date', :ruby => 'Example::Date'

[ show source ]

    # File lib/restfulx/amf/class_mapping.rb, line 19
19:       def map(params)
20:         [:as, :ruby].each {|k| params[k] = params[k].to_s if params[k] } # Convert params to strings
21:         
22:         if params.key?(:as) and params.key?(:ruby)
23:           @as_mappings[params[:as]] = params[:ruby]
24:           @ruby_mappings[params[:ruby]] = params[:as]
25:         end
26:         
27:         if params.key?(:as)
28:           params[:ruby] = get_ruby_class_name(params[:as])
29:         end
30:       end
